subject: Simsonn pro x ultra control box
description_text:
I recently bought vam pro. How to upgrade control box to make it works with
vam pro.

Thanks

conversations.body_text: Hi Alfani Gunawan,  Please update the software to version 2.1.0 and also update the firmware to the latest version to enable full support. I will provide you with our reference table, and you can also use SIMHUB 9.9.3.

How about upgrade button on control box?

On Tue, Jul 29, 2025, 10:30 PM support@simsonn.com
Hi Alfani Gunawan,    You can check for updates in the “Settings → Update” section to perform the upgrade.  The “Upgrade” button is only used for recovery in case of an upgrade failure.
